author: rooneg
msg: Some more xml encoding related fixes for mod_dav_svn.
(absent_helper): Encode the basename of the path.
(upd_close_file): Don't pass elt directly to dav_svn__send_xml, it's not
good practice to use generated strings as the format string in that sort
of thing, even if it may be safe in this particular case.

author: rooneg
msg: Follow up to r19760, verify that the propset actually worked before
we move on to running the diff.
(diff_weird_author): Verify that our propset actually worked.

author: cmpilato
msg: (misc_resources): Add link to the Segetech Open Source Rendezvous.

author: maxb
msg: * doc/design/license.xml: Update copyright year, and make link clickable by

author: sussman
msg: As a first experiment, make 'svn info --changelist FOO' work.
(svn_cl__info):  add members of changelist to the targets array.
